text: Bernardino Blaceo (active c. 1550) was an Italian painter of the Renaissance period. He painted for churches at Udine, among them, the principal altar- piece depicting Virgin and child, with Angels and Saints Lucia and Agatha’' for the church of Santa Lucia, and a Virgin and infant with Saints Peter and John’ for the church in Porta Nuova. ==References== * Category:16th-century Italian painters Category:Italian male painters Category:Renaissance painters Category:People from Udine Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing
title: Bernardino Blaceo
